title: Garment, 18th century
description: Small dress of light brown silk, scalloped at sleeves and hem; embroidered with flowers, leaves and scrolls in colored silks and metal (gold and silver wound  around a silk core). Embrodery design and colors alike on both front and back. Lined with blue silk.

tombstone.epitaph:
Garment, 18th century.Medium: silk
Technique: embroidered; lined. 1968-19-1.
